name: armor
description: Armor and protective equipment available for characters in Five Parsecs from Home

armor_categories.name: Light Armor
armor_categories.description: Lightweight protection that offers minimal encumbrance but limited protection.

armor_categories.name: Medium Armor
armor_categories.description: Balanced protection that offers moderate encumbrance and decent protection.

armor_categories.name: Heavy Armor
armor_categories.description: Heavy-duty protection that offers significant encumbrance but excellent protection.

armor_categories.name: Powered Armor
armor_categories.description: Mechanically assisted armor that offers excellent protection with reduced encumbrance.

armor_categories.name: Shields
armor_categories.description: Portable barriers that provide additional protection.

armor_categories.name: Specialized Protection
armor_categories.description: Equipment designed to protect against specific threats or environments.

armor.name: Padded Jacket
armor.description: A reinforced jacket with impact-absorbing materials sewn into key areas.
armor.special_rules: Can be worn under other clothing without detection.

armor.name: Mesh Vest
armor.description: A flexible vest made of interlocking synthetic fibers that absorb and disperse impact energy.
armor.special_rules: Provides +1 to armor save against projectile weapons.

armor.name: Stealth Suit
armor.description: A full-body suit made of sound-dampening and light-absorbing materials.
armor.special_rules: Grants +2 to all Stealth checks. Provides protection against extreme temperatures.

armor.name: Combat Armor
armor.description: Standard military-grade armor with reinforced plates over vital areas.
armor.special_rules: Can attach up to 2 armor modifications.

armor.name: Security Armor
armor.description: Armor designed for law enforcement and corporate security personnel.
armor.special_rules: Grants +1 to Intimidation checks. Includes built-in comm system.

armor.name: Hazard Suit
armor.description: A sealed suit designed to protect against environmental hazards.
armor.special_rules: Provides immunity to poison, disease, and radiation. Includes 4 hours of air supply.

armor.name: Heavy Combat Armor
armor.description: Reinforced military armor with thick plating and enhanced protection.
armor.special_rules: Reduces movement by 2". Provides +1 to armor save against explosive weapons.

armor.name: Riot Armor
armor.description: Armor designed to protect against blunt force trauma and melee attacks.
armor.special_rules: Provides +2 to armor save against melee attacks. Reduces movement by 2".

armor.name: Exo-Armor
armor.description: A non-powered exoskeleton frame with heavy armor plating.
armor.special_rules: Reduces movement by 3". Provides +1 to Strength checks. Cannot use Stealth.

armor.name: Light Power Armor
armor.description: A lightweight powered armor system that enhances mobility and protection.
armor.special_rules: Increases movement by 2". Provides immunity to poison and disease. Requires power cells that last for 48 hours of operation.

armor.name: Assault Power Armor
armor.description: Military-grade powered armor designed for frontline combat operations.
armor.special_rules: Provides +2 to Strength checks. Includes built-in targeting system (+1 to hit). Requires power cells that last for 24 hours of operation.

armor.name: Heavy Power Armor
armor.description: The heaviest class of powered armor, essentially a walking tank.
armor.special_rules: Provides +3 to Strength checks. Includes built-in targeting system (+1 to hit). Can mount one heavy weapon. Reduces damage from explosives by half. Requires power cells that last for 12 hours of operation.

armor.name: Combat Shield
armor.description: A portable energy shield that can be activated to block incoming attacks.
armor.special_rules: Must be held in one hand. Provides protection only against attacks from the front. Has 10 charges; each successful save uses 1 charge.

armor.name: Riot Shield
armor.description: A large physical shield made of transparent, impact-resistant material.
armor.special_rules: Must be held in one hand. Provides protection only against attacks from the front. User can see through the shield.

armor.name: Energy Shield Generator
armor.description: A device that projects an energy field around the wearer.
armor.special_rules: Provides a 5+ save against all attacks. If the shield fails a save, it deactivates for 1 turn while it recharges.

armor.name: Radiation Suit
armor.description: A suit designed to protect against radiation exposure.
armor.special_rules: Provides immunity to radiation. Includes 4 hours of air supply.

armor.name: Thermal Suit
armor.description: A suit designed to protect against extreme temperatures.
armor.special_rules: Provides immunity to extreme heat and cold.

armor.name: Psionic Dampening Helmet
armor.description: A helmet designed to protect against psychic attacks.
armor.special_rules: Provides a 4+ save against all psychic attacks and abilities.

armor_traits.name: Lightweight
armor_traits.description: The armor is particularly light and causes minimal encumbrance.

armor_traits.name: Concealable
armor_traits.description: The armor can be worn under normal clothing without being detected.

armor_traits.name: Flexible
armor_traits.description: The armor is highly flexible and does not restrict movement.

armor_traits.name: Stealth
armor_traits.description: The armor is designed to minimize noise and visibility.

armor_traits.name: Environmental
armor_traits.description: The armor provides protection against environmental hazards.

armor_traits.name: Durable
armor_traits.description: The armor is particularly resistant to damage and wear.

armor_traits.name: Modular
armor_traits.description: The armor can be customized with various attachments and modifications.

armor_traits.name: Intimidating
armor_traits.description: The armor's appearance is designed to intimidate others.

armor_traits.name: Sealed
armor_traits.description: The armor forms a sealed environment, protecting against airborne hazards.

armor_traits.name: Heavy
armor_traits.description: The armor is heavy and may restrict movement.

armor_traits.name: Very Heavy
armor_traits.description: The armor is extremely heavy and significantly restricts movement.

armor_traits.name: Impact Resistant
armor_traits.description: The armor is particularly effective against blunt force trauma.

armor_traits.name: Strength Enhancing
armor_traits.description: The armor enhances the wearer's physical strength.

armor_traits.name: Powered
armor_traits.description: The armor is powered by energy cells and includes mechanical assistance.

armor_traits.name: Enhanced Mobility
armor_traits.description: The armor enhances the wearer's speed and agility.

armor_traits.name: Integrated Systems
armor_traits.description: The armor includes built-in systems such as targeting, communications, or medical.

armor_traits.name: Weapon Mounts
armor_traits.description: The armor includes mounts for attaching weapons.

armor_traits.name: Directional
armor_traits.description: The protection is only effective from certain directions.

armor_traits.name: One-handed
armor_traits.description: The item must be held in one hand to be effective.

armor_traits.name: Transparent
armor_traits.description: The item is transparent, allowing visibility through it.

armor_traits.name: Regenerating
armor_traits.description: The protection can regenerate or recharge after being depleted.

armor_traits.name: Specialized
armor_traits.description: The item is designed for a specific purpose or against a specific threat.

armor_traits.name: Psionic
armor_traits.description: The item interacts with or protects against psychic energy.

armor_modifications.name: Reinforced Plating
armor_modifications.description: Additional armor plating that improves protection.
armor_modifications.effects: Improves armor save by 1 (e.g., 4+ becomes 3+). Increases encumbrance by 1.

armor_modifications.name: Lightweight Materials
armor_modifications.description: Advanced materials that reduce the armor's weight without sacrificing protection.
armor_modifications.effects: Reduces encumbrance by 1 (minimum 0). Does not affect armor save.

armor_modifications.name: Auto-Medicator
armor_modifications.description: A system that automatically administers medical treatment when the wearer is wounded.
armor_modifications.effects: Once per battle, when the wearer suffers a wound, they may immediately make a Toughness check (7+). If successful, the wound is negated.

armor_modifications.name: Stealth Coating
armor_modifications.description: A coating that reduces the armor's visibility to sensors and the naked eye.
armor_modifications.effects: Grants +1 to all Stealth checks. Incompatible with 'Intimidating' trait.

armor_modifications.name: Enhanced Power Cells
armor_modifications.description: Improved power cells that extend the operational duration of powered armor.
armor_modifications.effects: Doubles the operational duration of powered armor or powered shields.

armor_modifications.name: Reactive Plating
armor_modifications.description: Armor plating that reacts to incoming attacks, providing additional protection.
armor_modifications.effects: Once per turn, when the wearer fails an armor save, they may reroll it.

armor_modifications.name: Integrated Jetpack
armor_modifications.description: A jetpack built into the armor that allows for short bursts of flight.
armor_modifications.effects: Once per turn, the wearer may move an additional 6" in any direction, including vertically.

armor_modifications.name: Camouflage System
armor_modifications.description: A system that actively changes the armor's appearance to match the surroundings.
armor_modifications.effects: Grants +2 to all Stealth checks. When stationary, enemies suffer -2 to hit the wearer.

armor_modifications.name: Enhanced Targeting
armor_modifications.description: A targeting system integrated into the armor's helmet.
armor_modifications.effects: Grants +1 to hit with ranged attacks.

armor_modifications.name: Environmental Seals
armor_modifications.description: Seals and filters that protect against environmental hazards.
armor_modifications.effects: Grants the 'Sealed' trait. Provides immunity to airborne toxins and allows breathing in vacuum for up to 1 hour.
